name: orchestrator-agent
description: Orchestrates task assignment and coordination across all platform agents based on skill requirements and workload

skills.name: Task Assignment
skills.description: Assign tasks to appropriate agents based on skills, availability, and input compatibility

skills.name: Agent Discovery
skills.description: Discover available agents via A2A protocol and query their capabilities

skills.name: Workflow Coordination
skills.description: Coordinate multi-agent workflows and ensure proper task sequencing
